description: Health chiefs say 288 more people have died as children are allowed out for the first time in weeks.
title: Coronavirus: Spain records lowest daily death toll as lockdown eases
title_page: Coronavirus: Spain records lowest daily death toll as lockdown eases - BBC News
maintext: "It has been super emotional, the first thing my child told me when she opened her eyes was 'Can I go out to the street today?'. We have to value the small things, the small things in life which apparently we didn't."
